original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṁ kantanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ suttam kantanti

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo suttaṁ kantissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ suttam kantissanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ suttam kantissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṁ kantantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ suttam kantanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo suttaṁ kantissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ suttam kantissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī suttam kanteyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: khomaṁ, kappāsikaṁ, koseyyaṁ, kambalaṁ, sāṇaṁ, bhaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: khoma kappāsika koseyya kambala sāṇa bhaṅga
